page.title: 02Middle Ford Farm_ Background
page.content: Middle Ford farm is situated to the north of a very small village called Ford Street.This consists of about fifeteen house lining the road.Their only amenities consist of a telephone box and a post box.The owners of the farm are one of the few families who live and work in Ford Street as most people commute into Wellington or Taunton. This is a typical farm of the area being about one hundred and fifety acres in size.The owner of the farm is Mr Lane. The farm has been in Mr Lane's family since 1921 when his grandfather bought the farm.The family are now made up of Mr.and Mrs Lane and one son Adrian(who is six and goes to Wellesley Park School.)Mr. Lane's parents also live in the village.
